oai_dc:dc.dc:description: (Further details of the story of the men who hunted with bones.) The elder brother waits at home for his younger brother to return from hunting Lions. He sees the Lion's eyes shining and thinks they are stars and they approach and seize him. There follows a discussion of the bones the brothers made into knobkerries in order to hunt Lions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Men who hunted lions with bones Further details of
